# create initialization code using the component generator, generated
# files are available using
# ${cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskComponents_CISST_CG_SRCS}
cisst_component_generator (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskComponents
                           clockComponent.h
                           sineTask.h)

# to compile cisst generated code, need to find header file
include_directories (${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

# create a library of components
add_library (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskComponents
             # code files to compile
             clockComponent.cpp
             sineTask.cpp
             # files generated by cisstComponentGenerator and original header files
             ${cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskComponents_CISST_CG_SRCS}
             )

# link with the cisst libraries
cisst_target_link_libraries (cisstMultiTaskPeriodicTaskComponents cisstCommon cisstOSAbstraction cisstMultiTask)
